pages.text: So i heard copper and tin is not enough for you... what do you want then? What do you mean by iron? Well then, let me tell you how to do it: First get yourself a TON of copper plates.
pages.title: Chambers?

pages.text: You will need 9 copper plates for one plate block, and also some screws. Again, its a recipe crafted in the Stone workbench so cant be shown here.
pages.title: Da Chamber

pages.text: Now place them in a shape like its shown on the previous image. The minimum required volume inside a chamber, is 1x1x1 blocks (since you cant build smaller than a block), but you can build it bigger (Right now, a 50x55x1 chamber crashes the game. The world can be loaded without any problems after that). after you built your chamber, place a so called Limonite-Charcoal mix (which you can craft in a Stone Workbench), light it on fire and cover it up.
